Changelog
=========

2.0 - 2011-01-21
----------------

- Add an ordered PipelineFactory.
  [stefan]

- Add an accent-normalizing pipeline element originally contributed by
  Marc-Aurel Darche.
  [stefan]

- Release as Python egg.
  [stefan]

1.0 - 2006-08-14
----------------

- Initial release.
  [stefan]
